title: Multi-Frequency Study of FRB20201124A with the uGMRT
summary: We present results from multi-epoch observations of the repeating fast radio burst FRB 20201124A with the upgraded Giant Metrewave Radio Telescope (uGMRT) during its active phase between 8 May and 28 May 2021.
